name: Freedom Los Angeles July 4 2020
description: I captured this photography of a "bootleg" firework on July 4, 2020. All across Los Angeles, sprays of color, echoing booms, and clouds of smoke signaled a collective primal scream. The coronavirus pandemic had shattered an already weakened society. Every life followed a path that was proscribed, limited, and diminished compared to what we'd had before the lockdown. I think of this moment often, its defiance, its fierce celebratory lust for life, the way it shrugged off unintended consequences.
